trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.

This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Diese Klasse stellt die Basis für die <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> und <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> Klassen, die wiederum Argumente für die <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> und <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> bzw. weitergeleitete Ereignisse.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing a new current input language.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous current input language.
Initializes base class values for a new instance of a deriving class.
Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> should call this constructor to ensure that values provided by the abstract base class are initialized properly.
trans-unit.target: Abgeleitete Klassen <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> rufen Sie diesen Konstruktor, um sicherzustellen, dass von der abstrakten Basisklasse bereitgestellten Werte ordnungsgemäß initialisiert werden sollte.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatically call this base constructor.
trans-unit.target: Die Konstruktoren für <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> und <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatisch diese Basiskonstruktor aufrufen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new current input language.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> Objekt, das die neue aktuelle Eingabesprache darstellt.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `newLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert dieser Eigenschaft wird eingerichtet, über die `newLanguageId` Parameter bereitgestellt werden, indem die <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> Konstruktor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous current input language.
A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> Objekt, das die vorherige aktuelle Eingabesprache darstellt.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `previousLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert dieser Eigenschaft wird eingerichtet, über die `previousLanguageId` Parameter bereitgestellt werden, indem die <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> Konstruktor.
